title: What are some words and ideas that are related to the word 'history'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Related words: historical, story, historic, historicity, prehistory, prehistoric. Related ideas: the past, ancient times, olden times, chronicles, archives, sagas, antiquity, yesteryear, bygones, days of yore, long ago, former times, Medieval, eras, eons, annals, chronology, biography, antecedents, ancestors, biopic.
